# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(simple-webserver LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(simple-webserver "")
set_target_properties(simple-webserver PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "simple-webserver")
set_target_properties(simple-webserver PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/debug")
target_compile_options(simple-webserver PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
set_target_properties(simple-webserver PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(simple-webserver PRIVATE c_std_11)
set_target_properties(simple-webserver PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(simple-webserver PRIVATE cxx_std_14)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(simple-webserver PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(simple-webserver PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(simple-webserver PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(simple-webserver PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET simple-webserver PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(simple-webserver PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(simple-webserver PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
